element.definition: An explanation or justification for why this diagnostic investigation is being requested in coded or textual form.   This is often for billing purposes.  May relate to the resources referred to in supportingInformation.
element.comment: This may be used to decide how the diagnostic investigation will be performed, or even if it will be performed at all.   Use CodeableConcept text element if the data is free (uncoded) text as shown in the [CT Scan example](procedurerequest-example-di.html).

binding.description: Diagnosis or problem codes justifying the reason for requesting the procedure or diagnostic investigation.
